sql.js

Examples

  1. Online SQL Interpreter Full featured Sqlite Interpreter running in your browser.
  2. Online SQL read eval print loop simple SQLite REPL
  3. Persistence Persisting data
  4. RequireJS Load sql.js asynchronously using RequireJs
  5. Simple Example Demonstrates prepare,getAsObject, and other SQL.js methods.
Note: To run these examples locally, see ./examples/readme.md
